name: Grandma's Green Bean Casserole
author: Amy Barry
summary: This recipe is much better than the standard mushroom soup and French fried onion version.
ingredients: 3 (14.5 ounce) cans French style green beans, drained
½ cup crumbled buttery round crackers
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Melt 2 tablespoons butter in a large skillet over medium heat
Stir in flour until smooth, and cook for one minute
Stir in the salt, sugar, onion, and sour cream
Add green beans, and stir to coat
Transfer the mixture to a 2 1/2 quart casserole dish
Spread shredded cheese over the top
In a small bowl, toss together cracker crumbs and remaining butter, and sprinkle over the cheese
Bake for 30 minutes in the preheated oven, or until the top is golden and cheese is bubbly
